name: web-capture
description: Microservice to render web pages as HTML, Markdown, or PNG

scripts.test:all: yarn build && yarn test && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:e2e:docker
scripts.build: docker compose down && docker compose build && yarn start
scripts.examples:python: python3 examples/python/html_download.py && python3 examples/python/markdown_download.py && python3 examples/python/image_download.py
scripts.examples:javascript: node examples/js/html_download.js && node examples/js/markdown_download.js && node examples/js/image_download.js
scripts.examples: yarn build && yarn examples:javascript && yarn examples:python
